definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media
(of an actor) to disengage from the performance (e.g. after the show ends)/(of an audience) to lose interest in the performance
cast (of a movie etc)/lineup of performers/troupe

(TV or movie) blooper/continuity error/(theater) to flub one's lines/unintended exposure of a body part/to be exposed (of a scheme or trick)/to reveal sth one intended to conceal through a slip of the tongue/to blow one's cover
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
